snippet.title: Dreamed Away 2024 Trailer (Mother Direct)
snippet.description:
Free demo out now! 
Full game coming to PC/Switch/Xbox in Q1 2024.

Wishlist Dreamed Away on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1919900/Dreamed_Away/

Dreamed Away is an emotional action-adventure RPG with psychological horror elements. Play as Théo, a boy lost in a dark, mysterious world. Explore a unique reality, duel against darkness and mind your choices.

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/8gsQnqpVPx

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/DreamedAwayRPG
